org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

类 MemcachedBlockCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.MemcachedBlockCache
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Iterable<CachedBlock>, BlockCache

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class MemcachedBlockCache
extends Object
implements BlockCache
    Class to store blocks into memcached. This should only be used on a cluster of Memcached daemons that are tuned well and have a good network connection to the HBase regionservers. Any other use will likely slow down HBase greatly.

    • 方法详细资料

      • cacheBlock

        public void cacheBlock(BlockCacheKey cacheKey,
                       Cacheable buf,
                       boolean inMemory)
        从接口复制的说明: BlockCache
        Add block to cache.
        指定者:
        cacheBlock 在接口中 BlockCache
        参数:
        cacheKey - The block's cache key.
        buf - The block contents wrapped in a ByteBuffer.
        inMemory - Whether block should be treated as in-memory

      • cacheBlock

        public void cacheBlock(BlockCacheKey cacheKey,
                       Cacheable buf)
        从接口复制的说明: BlockCache
        Add block to cache (defaults to not in-memory).
        指定者:
        cacheBlock 在接口中 BlockCache
        参数:
        cacheKey - The block's cache key.
        buf - The object to cache.

      • getBlock

        public Cacheable getBlock(BlockCacheKey cacheKey,
                          boolean caching,
                          boolean repeat,
                          boolean updateCacheMetrics)
        从接口复制的说明: BlockCache
        Fetch block from cache.
        指定者:
        getBlock 在接口中 BlockCache
        参数:
        cacheKey - Block to fetch.
        caching - Whether this request has caching enabled (used for stats)
        repeat - Whether this is a repeat lookup for the same block (used to avoid double counting cache misses when doing double-check locking)
        updateCacheMetrics - Whether to update cache metrics or not
        返回:
        Block or null if block is not in 2 cache.

      • evictBlock

        public boolean evictBlock(BlockCacheKey cacheKey)
        从接口复制的说明: BlockCache
        Evict block from cache.
        指定者:
        evictBlock 在接口中 BlockCache
        参数:
        cacheKey - Block to evict
        返回:
        true if block existed and was evicted, false if not

      • evictBlocksByHfileName

        public int evictBlocksByHfileName(String hfileName)
        This method does nothing so that memcached can handle all evictions.
        指定者:
        evictBlocksByHfileName 在接口中 BlockCache
        返回:
        the number of blocks evicted
